name: Vicky the Viking: The Big Trial
name_original: Vicky the Viking: The Big Trial
description:
Vicky the Viking: The Big Trial is an arcade game developed by Tivola Publishing. It came out on 05-09-2001. It was published by Tivola Publishing. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Vicky the Viking: The Big Trial on PC.
